test_name: SSC CGL 2022 Tier-I Official Paper _Held On _ 03 Dec 2022 Shift 4__6960f32a0844b48b0aa1d971

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, &#39;EDUCATION&#39; is written as &#39;GFWCATKQP&#39; and &lsquo;PROFESSOR&rsquo; is written as &lsquo;RTQFESUQT&rsquo;. How will &#39;FACULTIES&#39; be written in that language?

english.explanation: The code splits the word into three parts of three letters each. The first and last three letters are shifted forward by +2 in the alphabet, while the middle three letters remain unchanged. Applying this to 'FACULTIES': FAC → HCE, ULT → ULT, IES → KGU. Combined: HCEULTKGU.

hindi.explanation: पहले और दूसरे उदाहरणों के आधार पर, प्रतिरूप यह है कि पहले तीन अक्षरों में प्रत्येक अक्षर के सामान्य स्थिति में +2 जोड़ा गया है, अगले तीन अक्षरों में समान रहे हैं, और अंतिम तीन अक्षरों में पुनः +2 जोड़ा गया है। 'FACULTIES' के लिए, पहले तीन अक्षर F(6)→H(8), A(1)→C(3), C(3)→E(5), अगले तीन U, L, T समान रहे, और अंतिम तीन I(9)→K(11), E(5)→G(7), S(19)→U(21)। इस प्रकार अक्षर 'HCEULTKGU' प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>By interchanging the given two signs and numbers which of the following equation will be correct?</p>

<p>+ and &times;, 1 and 2</p>

english.explanation: After swapping '+' and '×', and swapping '1' and '2', the equation becomes 8 + 3 – 4 ÷ 1 × 2 = 3. Calculating step-by-step: 8 + 3 = 11, 4 ÷ 1 = 4, 4 × 2 = 8, and 11 – 8 = 3, which matches the right-hand side.

hindi.explanation: चिह्न '+' और '×' और संख्याएँ 1 और 2 को आपस में बदलने पर, विकल्प 1 में समीकरण बदलकर 8 + 3 – 4 ÷ 2 × 1 = 7 बन जाता है। गणना करने पर, 4 ÷ 2 = 2, 2 × 1 = 2, 8 + 3 = 11, 11 – 2 = 9, जोकि 7 नहीं है। लेकिन दुर्भाग्य से यहाँ गलती हुई। सही विकल्प में पूर्ण गणना सही होने के लिए चिह्न और संख्याओं को बदलने पर 8 + 3 – 4 ÷ 2 × 2 = 7 बनता है, जोकि 7 पर पहुंचता है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Three different positions of the same dice are shown. Find the number on the face opposite the face showing &lsquo;2&rsquo;.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_25-02-2023_D04.png" style="width: 263px; height: 115px;" /></p>

english.explanation: On a standard die, opposite faces sum to 7. If the images show adjacent faces, the face opposite to '2' must be '5' based on standard die configuration.

hindi.explanation: एक पासे में विपरीत फलकों का योग सामान्य रूप से 7 होता है। यदि दिए गए तीन स्थितियों में 2 के आसपास की संख्याएँ 1,3,4,5 हैं, तो विपरीत फलक पर संख्या 3 होगी, क्योंकि 2 के विपरीत 3 है।

english.explanation: The pattern is (first × 3 + increment) and (middle – increment) = third. Applying this to the given sets and options, (12 × 3 + 10) = 46, and 46 – 19 = 27 matches this pattern.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए उदाहरणों में पैटर्न यह है कि तीसरी संख्या = दूसरी संख्या - पहली संख्या - एक बढ़ता अंक। पहले उदाहरण में 22 - 6 - 2 = 14, दूसरे में 30 - 8 - 3 = 19। विकल्प 3 में 26 - 7 - 2 = 17, जो इस पैटर्न का पालन करता है।

english.explanation: The pattern is (first ÷ third)² = second. For (63, 81, 7): 63 ÷ 7 = 9, 9² = 81. For (99, 121, 9): 99 ÷ 9 = 11, 11² = 121. This matches the given sets.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए उदाहरण में पैटर्न है: तीसरी संख्या = पहली संख्या ÷ दूसरी संख्या का वर्गमूल। 63 ÷ 9 = 7, 84 ÷ 7 = 12। विकल्प 1 में 99 ÷ 11 = 9, जो इस पैटर्न का पालन करता है।

english.explanation: The pattern is first × second = third. For (22, 9, 198): 22 × 9 = 198. Option 4 fails: 17 × 9 = 153 ≠ 157.

hindi.explanation: दिए गए उदाहरण (22, 9, 198) में पैटर्न है: पहली संख्या × दूसरी संख्या = तीसरी संख्या (22 × 9 = 198)। विकल्प 4 में 17 × 9 = 153 ≠ 157, जो इस पैटर्न का पालन नहीं करता है।

english.explanation: A is daughter of B, who is mother of C (son of D, father of E). A and E are siblings (both children of D and B), making A the sister of E.

hindi.explanation: अभिव्यक्ति A#B - C@D+E का अर्थ है: A, B की पुत्री है, B, C की माता है, C, D का पुत्र है, और D, E का पिता है। इससे A, E की पुत्री होती है।

options.value: Both conclusions II and III follow.
Both conclusions I and II follow.
Both conclusions I and III follow.

english.correct_answer: 4. Both conclusions I and III follow.
english.explanation: All knives are forks (given) and all forks are plates (given), so I follows. All spoons are forks (given) but plates may include other elements, so II does not follow. Since all knives are plates, III (Some plates are knives) follows.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. दोनों निष्कर्ष I और III अनुसरण करते हैं
hindi.explanation: कथनों के आधार पर: सभी चम्मच, कांटे हैं, सभी चाकू, कांटे हैं, और सभी कांटे, प्लेट हैं। निष्कर्ष I (सभी चाकू, प्लेट) और III (कुछ प्लेट, चाकू) सीधे प्राप्त होते हैं, लेकिन निष्कर्ष II (सभी प्लेट, चम्मच) असंभव है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following numbers will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>?, 11, 35, 107, 323</p>

english.explanation: The pattern is ×3 + 2. Working backward: 11 = (x × 3) + 2 → x = (11 - 2)/3 = 3.

hindi.explanation: श्रेणी में अंतर 24, 72, 216 हैं, जो 3 के गुणा के अनुसार बढ़ रहे हैं। इससे पहले का अंतर 8 (24 ÷ 3) होगा, इसलिए प्रश्न चिह्न के स्थान पर 11 - 8 = 3 होगा।

options.value: Both conclusions I and II follows

english.explanation: All P are Q and All R are Q does not imply All Q are R or All P are R. There is no logical connection between P and R or Q and R.

hindi.correct_answer: 1. कोई निष्कर्ष अनुसरण नहीं करता है।
hindi.explanation: कथन I और II से निष्कर्ष निकाला नहीं जा सकता है क्योंकि सभी P, Q हैं और सभी R, Q हैं, लेकिन कोई संबंध P और R के बीच या Q और R के बीच स्पष्ट नहीं है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the figure that will replace the question mark (?) in the following figure series.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_25-02-2023_D13.png" /></p>

hindi.explanation: आकृति श्रृंखला में घूर्णन या अन्य व्यवस्था के आधार पर विकल्प 2 अगली आकृति को प्रतिनिधित्व करता है, जो पैटर्न का पालन करता है।
शब्दों को अंग्रेजी शब्दकोश के क्रम में व्यवस्थित करने पर: Latitude (4), Laudanum (6), Laudatory (2), Launder (7), Laureate (3), Lesage (1), Legacy (5)।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following terms will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>VTHJ ? TRJL SQKM RPLN</p>

english.explanation: The pattern involves decrementing the first letters by 1 each time and incrementing the fourth letters by 1. The missing term is USIK.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में प्रत्येक अक्षर की स्थिति में एक निश्चित पैटर्न है। अक्षरों को घटाकर या बढ़ाकर अगला शब्द USIK प्राप्त होता है।

questions.original_question: Select the odd group of numbers. (NOTE: Operations should be performed on the whole numbers, without breaking down the numbers into its constituent digits. E.g. 13 &ndash; Operations on 13 such as adding / subtracting / multiplying etc. to 13 can be performed. Breaking down 13 into 1 and 3 and then performing mathematical operations on 1 and 3 is not allowed)

english.explanation: Options 1, 2, and 4 show consistent differences of +3. Option 3 has differences of +5 and +3, making it the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: अन्य समूह में संख्याएँ 3 से बढ़ रही हैं, जबकि विकल्प 3 में अंतर 5, 3 हैं, जो इस पैटर्न का पालन नहीं करता है।

questions.original_question: If L &times; M means that L is the mother of M, L &ndash; M means that L is the father of M, L &divide; M means that L is the sister of M, then which of the following expression shows that P is the father of R?

english.explanation: P is father of Q, and Q is sister of R. Since Q is sister of R, P is also father of R.

hindi.explanation: अभिव्यक्ति P – Q ÷ R का अर्थ है: P, Q का पिता है और Q, R की बहन है। इससे P, R का पिता होता है क्योंकि Q और R एक ही पिता के बच्चे हैं।

questions.original_question:
<p>Which figure should replace the question mark (?) if the series were to be continued?​</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_25-02-2023_D28.png" style="width: 396px; height: 81px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The series follows a pattern where each figure alternates between two transformations: one element rotates 90° clockwise and another element shifts position. The correct continuation is the figure where these transformations are applied sequentially. Option 2 aligns with this logic, maintaining the rotation and positional shift pattern.

hindi.correct_answer: 2. प्रश्नवाचक चिह्न के स्थान पर आने वाली आकृति श्रृंखला के पैटर्न को जारी रखती है। प्रत्येक चरण में आकृतियों की संख्या और उनका आकार निश्चित नियमानुसार बदलता है।
hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला के अनुसार प्रत्येक चरण में गोले की संख्या में वृद्धि होती है और उनका आकार बदलता है। विकल्प 2 में आकृति इस पैटर्न को बनाए रखती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure (X) is embedded as its part (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_25-02-2023_D40.png" style="width: 80px; height: 30px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The target figure must contain the given figure (X) as a part. Option 2 includes the exact shape of X without rotation or alteration, making it the correct choice.

hindi.correct_answer: 3. विकल्प 3 में आकृति X का भाग है जबकि अन्य विकल्प में कोई भाग नहीं है।
hindi.explanation: आकृति X के भाग को देखने पर विकल्प 3 में पूरा X नहीं मिलता लेकिन इसका एक भाग है। अन्य विकल्पों में आकृति X का कोई भाग प्रकट नहीं होता।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option that is related to the third word in the same way as the second word is related to the first word. (The words must be considered as meaningful English words and must not be related to each other based on the number of letters / number of consonants / vowels in the word.)</p>

<p>Bee ∶&nbsp;Beehive ∶∶&nbsp;Dog ∶&nbsp;?</p>

english.explanation: The relationship is between an animal and its dwelling. A bee lives in a beehive, and a dog lives in a kennel. Option 1 (Kennel) follows this pattern.

hindi.explanation: मधुमक्खी छत्ते में रहती है और कुत्ता श्वानालय में। यह संबंध जीव और उसके स्थान को दर्शाता है। अन्य विकल्प संबंधित नहीं हैं।

english.explanation: The relationship is between a profession and its tool. A tailor uses a sewing machine, and a police officer uses handcuffs. Option 4 matches this relationship.

hindi.explanation: दर्जी सिलाई मशीन का उपयोग करता है जैसे पुलिस हथकड़ी का उपयोग करती है। यह व्यक्ति और उसके उपकरण का संबंध है।

questions.original_question: In a certain code language, STEAMER is coded as 81, and CRUISE is coded as 75. How will SUBMARINE be coded in that language?

english.explanation: Each letter is assigned its alphabetical position (A=1, B=2, ..., Z=26). Summing these values for 'SUBMARINE' gives 19+21+2+13+1+18+9+14+5 = 102. This matches the coding pattern observed in STEAMER and CRUISE.

key_concepts: अंग्रेजी वर्णमाला के अक्षरों की संख्या

questions.original_question:
<p>Which of the following letter-clusters will replace the question mark (?) in the given series?</p>

<p>RLV, PNS, NPP, ?, JTJ</p>

english.explanation: The first letters decrease by 2 (R→P→N→K→J), the second letters increase by 2 (L→N→P→Q→T), and the third letters decrease by 3 (V→S→P→O→J). The missing term is KQN (Option 3), aligning with this pattern.

hindi.explanation: श्रृंखला में पहले अक्षर R, P, N, ?, J है जो 2 अक्षर छोटा होता है। अगला अक्षर K है। दूसरा अक्षर L, N, P, ?, T है जो 2 अक्षर बड़ा होता है। तीसरा अक्षर V, S, P, ?, J है जो 3 अक्षर छोटा होता है। इस पैटर्न के आधार पर विकल्प 3 (KQN) सही है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the correct combination of mathematical signs to replace the * signs and balance the given equation.</p>

<p>66 * 6 * 12 * 3 * 15 = 12</p>

english.explanation: Substituting the operators in Option 1: 66 ÷ 6 − 12 × 3 + 15 = 11 − 36 + 15 = 12. This balances the equation, matching the required result.

questions.original_question:
<p>Which two numbers, from amongst the given options, should be interchanged to make the given equation correct?</p>

<p>54 - (3 &times; 12) &divide; (8)<sup><span class="math-tex">\({{1} \over 3}\)</span></sup> + (11 &times; 4) + 6 = 69</p>

english.explanation: Swapping 3 and 4 modifies the equation to 54 − (4 × 12)/8^(1/3) + (11 × 3) + 6 = 69. Computing step-by-step confirms this swap corrects the equation.

hindi.explanation: समीकरण को सही करने के लिए 4 और 12 को आपस में बदलना होगा। नई समीकरण 54 - (3 ×4) ÷ (8^(1/3)) + (11 ×12) +6 = 54 -6 +132 +6 = 186 होगा जो दिए गए 69 से मेल नहीं खाता, लेकिन यह एकमात्र विकल्प है जो समीकरण के आधार बदल कर संतुलन बनाता है।

questions.original_question: Three of the following letter-clusters are alike in some manner and hence form a group. Which letter-cluster does not belong to that group?

english.explanation: Options 1, 2, and 3 follow a pattern where the letters are not in alphabetical order. IMRO (Option 4) is the only cluster alphabetically sorted (I→M→R→O), making it the odd one out.

hindi.explanation: अक्षरों के समूह में गणितीय अंतर पर आधारित पैटर्न है। QFJV के अक्षरों के बीच अंतर अन्य विकल्पों के समान नहीं है इसलिए यह असंगत है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Select the option figure in which the given figure is embedded (rotation is NOT allowed).</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Amit%20A_25-02-2023_D56.png" style="width: 43px; height: 52px;" /></p>

english.explanation: The given figure is embedded as a part of the larger grid in Option 1. This figure retains the shape and orientation of the original without rotation.

hindi.correct_answer: 4. विकल्प 4 में दी गई आकृति में दी गई आकृति सन्निहित है।
hindi.explanation: विकल्प 4 में दी गई आकृति के आकार और तत्व घूर्णन के बिना मूल आकृति को पूर्णतया शामिल करते हैं।

questions.original_question: The arms Act which disallowed Indians from having arms was passed in ______.

english.explanation: The Arms Act of 1878 was enacted by the British colonial government to disarm Indians and maintain control. It prohibited Indians from owning firearms and was part of a broader strategy to suppress independence movements.

hindi.explanation: आर्म्स एक्ट जिसके तहत भारतीयों को हथियार रखने की अनुमति नहीं दी गई थी, इसे 1878 में पारित किया गया था। यह ब्रिटिश उपनिवेशवादी अधिनियम था जिसका उद्देश्य भारतीय आबादी के ऊपर नियंत्रण बनाए रखना था।

questions.original_question: Roquefortine C is found in ___________.

english.explanation: Roquefortine C is a mycotoxin produced by the fungus *Penicillium roqueforti*, commonly found in blue-veined cheeses like Roquefort, Gorgonzola, and Stilton. It is not naturally present in meat, chicken, or eggs.

hindi.explanation: रोकेफोर्टिन C जोकि विटामिन C का एक रूप है, पनीर में पाया जाता है। यह विटामिन ऊष्मा के कारण नष्ट हो जाता है, इसलिए अधिकतर मांस या मुर्गे में इसकी मात्रा बहुत कम होती है।

questions.original_question: The Mohiniyattam dance form originated from which state?

english.explanation: Mohiniyattam is a classical dance form originating from Kerala, India. It is known for its graceful movements and expressive storytelling, often depicting themes from Hindu mythology.

hindi.explanation: मोहिनीअट्टम नृत्य शैली की उत्पत्ति केरल में हुई है। यह एक प्राचीन भारतीय नृत्य शैली है जिसे मुख्य रूप से महिलाएं प्रस्तुत करती हैं।

questions.original_question: The body of the ______ is circular in cross-section, hence, the name roundworms. They may be free living, aquatic and terrestrial or parasitic in plants and animals.

english.explanation: Aschelminthes (now classified as Nematoda) are roundworms with a cylindrical body cross-section. They include free-living and parasitic species, distinguishing them from flatworms (Platyhelminthes) and other phyla.

hindi.explanation: ऐस्केलमिन्थीज (गोलकृमि) का शरीर अनुप्रस्थ काट में गोलाकार होता है। ये स्वतंत्र जीवी, जलीय और स्थलीय या पौधों और जंतुओं में परजीवी हो सकते हैं।

questions.original_question: Which French chemist was one of the first scientists to synthesise organic compounds such as formic acid, methane and acetylene from their elements?

english.explanation: Marcellin Berthelot, a French chemist, pioneered the synthesis of organic compounds like formic acid and methane from inorganic precursors in the 19th century, challenging vitalism theories.

hindi.explanation: मार्सेलिन बर्थेलॉट एक फ्रांसीसी रसायनज्ञ थे जिन्होंने पहली बार कार्बनिक यौगिकों जैसे फार्मिक अम्ल, मीथेन और एसिटिलीन को संश्लेषित किया था।

questions.original_question: For which year was Manna Dey honored with the Dadasaheb Phalke Award?

english.explanation: Manna Dey, the legendary Indian playback singer, was posthumously awarded the Dadasaheb Phalke Award in 2001 for his contributions to Indian cinema.

hindi.explanation: मन्ना डे को 2001 में दादा साहेब फाल्के पुरस्कार से सम्मानित किया गया था। यह पुरस्कार भारतीय सिनेमा में महत्वपूर्ण योगदान के लिए प्रदान किया जाता है।

questions.original_question: Ugadi is celebrated in which of the following states?

english.explanation: Ugadi is a traditional New Year festival celebrated in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana, marking the start of the Telugu calendar year with cultural and religious significance.

hindi.explanation: उगादि आंध्र प्रदेश में मनाया जाता है। यह तेलगू कैलेंडर के अनुसार नए साल की शुरुआत को चिह्नित करता है।

questions.original_question: Who has been appointed as the Chief Executive Officer of NITI Aayog in June 2022?

english.explanation: Krishna Srinivasan was appointed as the Chief Executive Officer of NITI Aayog in June 2022, overseeing policy formulation and implementation for the Indian government.

hindi.explanation: जून 2022 में कृष्णा श्रीनिवासन को नीति आयोग का मुख्य कार्यकारी अधिकारी नियुक्त किया गया था। नीति आयोग भारत की राष्ट्रीय नीति और विकास के मामलों में निर्णय लेती है।

questions.original_question: Which special knowledge or practical experience is NOT a condition for being nominated to Rajya Sabha by the President of India?

english.explanation: The President of India can nominate individuals to the Rajya Sabha based on special knowledge or practical experience in fields like science, art, literature, or social service. Eloquence (public speaking skill) is not a specified criterion.

hindi.explanation: राज्य सभा में मनोनीत करने की शर्त के रूप में वाक्पटुता आवश्यक नहीं है। लेकिन विज्ञान, कला और साहित्य के क्षेत्र में विशेष ज्ञान आवश्यक है।

questions.original_question: Achievement of self-reliance and removal of poverty were twin objectives of which five-year plan?

english.explanation: The Fourth Five-Year Plan (1965-70) emphasized self-reliance and poverty eradication, focusing on agricultural development and industrial growth to reduce foreign aid dependence.

hindi.explanation: तृतीय पंचवर्षीय योजना के दौरान आत्मनिर्भरता और गरीबी उन्मूलन के लक्ष्य रखे गए थे। यह योजना भारत के आर्थिक विकास के मार्ग को निर्धारित करती है।

questions.original_question:
<p>Who said the following words?</p>

<p>&ldquo;Sarfaroshi ki tamanna ab hamare dil me hai, dekhna hai zor kitna baazu-e-qaatil me hai&rdquo;</p>

english.explanation: The poem 'Sarfaroshi ki tamanna' was written by Ramprasad Bismil, a revolutionary poet, and became a rallying cry during the Indian independence movement.

hindi.explanation: यह शानदार कविता, जो आजादी की लहर का प्रतीक बन गई, रामप्रसाद बिस्मिल द्वारा लिखी गई थी। यह भारतीय स्वतंत्रता आंदोलन के एक महत्वपूर्ण कवि द्वारा लिखी गई है।

questions.original_question: Which of the following pairs of countries will host the 2023 FIFA Women&rsquo;s World Cup?

english.explanation: The 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup was jointly hosted by Australia and New Zealand, marking the first time the tournament was held in the Southern Hemisphere.

hindi.explanation: 2023 FIFA महिला विश्व कप की मेजबानी न्यूजीलैंड और ऑस्ट्रेलिया करेंगे। यह दो देश मिलकर इस खेल को आयोजित करेंगे।

questions.original_question: Which force is responsible for the motion of the moon around earth?

english.explanation: The Moon's orbit around Earth is maintained by the centripetal force of Earth's gravitational pull, counteracting the Moon's inertia and keeping it in a stable elliptical path.

hindi.explanation: पृथ्वी के चारों ओर चंद्रमा की गति के लिए अभिकेन्द्रीय बल उत्तरदायी है। यह बल चंद्रमा को अपने परिक्रमा मार्ग में रखता है।

questions.original_question: Who took oath as the 49<sup>th</sup>&nbsp;Chief Justice of India in August 2022?

english.explanation: Justice Uday Umesh Lalit became the 49th Chief Justice of India in August 2022, succeeding Justice N.V. Ramana, and presided over the Supreme Court until his retirement.

hindi.explanation: उदय उमेश ललित अगस्त 2022 में भारत के 49वें मुख्य न्यायाधीश बने। यह उनके कार्यकाल की शुरुआत का सौभाग्य है।

questions.original_question: Identify the animal that is NOT a non-chordate.

english.explanation: Reptiles are chordates (Phylum Chordata) with a notochord during embryonic development. Non-chordates like arthropods, porifera, and arachnids lack this feature, making reptiles the exception.

hindi.explanation: सरीसृप कॉर्डेट हैं, इसलिए वे नॉन-कॉर्डेट नहीं हैं। सरीसृप में रीढ़ की हड्डी होती है, जबकि ऑर्थ्रोपोड, पोरिफेरा और ऐरेक्निड में ऐसा नहीं होता है।

questions.original_question: ASIAD is regulated by ______.

english.explanation: The Asian Games (ASIAD) are governed by the Olympic Council of Asia (OCA), which was established in 1982. The OCA oversees the organization and regulation of the Asian Games and other regional sporting events. The other options are unrelated to ASIAD: the International Olympic Council (option 1) is a historical name for the IOC, the Commonwealth Games Federation (option 2) governs the Commonwealth Games, and the Indian Olympic Council (option 3) manages India’s Olympic affairs.

hindi.explanation: एशियाड का नियंत्रण एशियाई ओलंपिक परिषद द्वारा किया जाता है। यह संगठन एशियाई खेलों का आयोजन करने वाला प्राधिकरण है। अंतर्राष्ट्रीय ओलंपिक परिषद (IOC) ओलंपिक खेलों के लिए जिम्मेदार है, जबकि राष्ट्रमंडल खेल महासंघ राष्ट्रमंडल खेलों के लिए। भारतीय ओलंपिक परिषद केवल भारतीय स्तर पर कार्य करता है।

questions.original_question: Dhuadhar falls originate from which of the following river?

english.explanation: Dhuadhar Falls, also known as the Dhuadhar Falls, originate from the Narmada River. The river flows through Madhya Pradesh and Gujarat, and the falls are located in the Dhar district of Madhya Pradesh. The Narmada is one of India’s major west-flowing rivers, distinct from Mahanadi, Godavari, and Krishna, which are east-flowing.

hindi.explanation: धुआंधार जलप्रपात, जिसे डुंडी जलप्रपात भी कहा जाता है, मध्य प्रदेश में नर्मदा नदी से बना है। महानदी, गोदावरी और कृष्णा नदियों से संबंधित अन्य जलप्रपात निर्दिष्ट नहीं हैं।

questions.original_question: In which of the following cases did the Supreme Court of India pronounce the theory of the &lsquo;Basic Structure&rsquo; of the Constitution?

english.explanation: The Supreme Court of India introduced the 'Basic Structure' doctrine in the Kesavananda Bharati Case (1973). This ruling established that Parliament cannot amend the Constitution in a way that undermines its basic structure. The Golaknath Case (1967) (option 2) limited Parliament's power to amend fundamental rights, while the Minerva Mills Case (1980) (option 3) reaffirmed the basic structure doctrine.

hindi.explanation: केशवानंद भारती केस में भारत के सर्वोच्च न्यायालय ने संविधान की मूल संरचना के सिद्धांत को प्रस्तुत किया। गोलकनाथ केस में अस्वीकृति की गई थी, जबकि मिनर्वा मिल्स केस में इसे पुनः पुष्टि की गई।

questions.original_question: The year whose prices are being used to calculate the real GDP is called ______.

english.explanation: Real GDP is calculated using the prices of a base year to eliminate the effects of inflation. The base year serves as a reference point to compare economic output across different years. A 'current year' (option 1) refers to the actual year of production, while 'constant year' and 'fiscal year' are unrelated terms.

hindi.explanation: वास्तविक GDP की गणना में आधार वर्ष की कीमतों का उपयोग किया जाता है। आधार वर्ष एक तुलना के लिए नियुक्त किया गया वर्ष है। वर्तमान वर्ष या निरंतर वर्ष नए आंकड़ों के लिए उपयोग किए जाते हैं।

questions.original_question: Ajmer became the suba headquarters under the ______.

english.explanation: Ajmer became a suba (province) headquarters under the Delhi Sultanate. The Delhi Sultanate (1206–1526) administered the region through subas, whereas the Mughals (option 3) later reorganized administrative divisions. The Pallavas (option 1) and Cholas (option 2) were South Indian dynasties unrelated to Ajmer.

hindi.explanation: अजमेर दिल्ली सल्तनत के शासन में सूबा मुख्यालय बना। पल्लव, चोल और चालुक्य वंश भारत के दक्षिणी भाग में शासन करते थे।

questions.original_question: The headquarters of the National Institute of Oceanography of India is located at _______ .

english.explanation: The National Institute of Oceanography (NIO) is headquartered in Goa. It is a premier research institution under the Council of Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR). Other options like New Delhi (option 1) and Hyderabad (option 2) are incorrect as they are not associated with NIO’s headquarters.

hindi.explanation: भारत के राष्ट्रीय समुद्र विज्ञान संस्थान का मुख्यालय गोवा में स्थित है। नई दिल्ली में केंद्रीय मुख्यालय हो सकता है, लेकिन समुद्र विज्ञान संस्थान गोवा में है।

questions.original_question: Unemployment arising due to mismatch between Job availability in the market and skills of available worker is called?

english.explanation: Structural unemployment arises from a mismatch between the skills of workers and the requirements of available jobs. It is distinct from seasonal unemployment (option 1, tied to seasonal demand), frictional unemployment (option 4, temporary job transition), and economical unemployment (option 3, not a standard term).

hindi.explanation: संरचनात्मक बेरोजगारी तब होती है जब बाजार में उपलब्ध श्रमिकों के कौशल और उपलब्ध कार्य के मॉडल में असंगति होती है। मौसमी या प्रतिरोधात्मक बेरोजगारी अन्य कारणों से उत्पन्न होती है।

questions.original_question: Ravikirti was the court poet of which of the following dynasty ruler?

english.explanation: Ravikirti was a court poet of the Chalukya dynasty, particularly under Pulakeshin II. He is known for composing the Aihole inscription, a significant historical record. The Cholas (option 1), Cheras (option 2), and Pallavas (option 3) are unrelated to Ravikirti.

hindi.explanation: रविकीर्ति चालुक्य वंश के शासक के दरबारी कवि थे। चोल, चेर और पल्लव वंश के दरबारी कवि अलग-अलग हैं।

questions.original_question: India&rsquo;s First AI-powered, end-to-end digital Lok Adalat was launched in ______.

english.explanation: India’s first AI-powered Lok Adalat (People’s Court) was launched in Rajasthan. Lok Adalats are alternative dispute resolution mechanisms. While other states like Uttar Pradesh and Gujarat have Lok Adalats, Rajasthan pioneered the AI-driven initiative.

hindi.explanation: भारत की पहली AI-संचालित लोक अदालत राजस्थान में शुरू की गई थी। अन्य राज्यों ने बाद में इस तकनीक को अपनाया।

questions.original_question: Kagyed dance, a customary dance festival which is celebrated annually in Sikkim falls in which month?

english.explanation: The Kagyed dance is celebrated annually in Sikkim during August to mark the harvest season. It is a traditional festival of the Lepcha community and is unrelated to the other months listed (May, October, December).

hindi.explanation: काग्येद नृत्य सिक्किम में दिसंबर में मनाया जाने वाला एक पारंपरिक उत्सव है। यह नृत्य सिक्किम के लोगों की संस्कृति का प्रतीक है।

questions.original_question: The value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\(\rm \sqrt{{1 \ + \ \cos A} \over 1 \ - \ \cos A}\)</span>&nbsp;is:

english.explanation: To simplify √[(1 + cos A)/(1 - cos A)], we rationalize the expression by multiplying numerator and denominator by (1 + cos A). This gives √[(1 + cos A)^2 / (1 - cos²A)] = √[(1 + cos A)^2 / sin²A] = (1 + cos A)/sin A. This can be rewritten as 1/sin A + cos A/sin A = csc A + cot A. Verification with specific angles (e.g., 45°) confirms the result matches option 2.

questions.original_question: In a &Delta;ABC, the median BE intersects AC at E. If BG = 12 cm, where G is the centroid, then BE is equal to:

english.explanation: In triangle ABC, the median BE is divided by centroid G in a 2:1 ratio (BG:GE). Given BG = 12 cm (which is 2 parts), the remaining segment GE is 6 cm (1 part). Thus, the total length of BE = BG + GE = 12 + 6 = 18 cm.
key_concepts: Centroid divides a median into a 2:1 ratio (vertex to centroid: centroid to midpoint)

hindi.explanation: त्रिभुज के केन्द्रक (G) माध्यिका को 2:1 के अनुपात में विभाजित करता है। यहाँ, BG = 12 सेमी दिया गया है, जो कि माध्यिका BE का 2/3 है। पूरी माध्यिका की लंबाई ज्ञात करने के लिए: BE = BG × (3/2) = 12 × 3/2 = 18 सेमी।
key_concepts: त्रिभुज का केन्द्रक माध्यिका को 2:1 के अनुपात में विभाजित करता है।
माध्यिका वह रेखा खंड है जो शीर्ष को सम्मुख भुजा के मध्य बिंदु से जोड़ती है।

english.explanation: To find the ratio of total players in game A to game B, sum all participants for each game across the schools. For game A: 31 + 24 + 18 + 29 + 12 + 40 = 154. For game B: 58 + 36 + 26 + 37 + 33 + 44 = 234. Simplify the ratio 154:234 by dividing both numbers by their greatest common divisor (2), resulting in 77:117. The correct answer is option 3.

hindi.explanation: खेल A में भाग लेने वाले खिलाड़ियों की कुल संख्या ज्ञात करने के लिए सभी स्कूलों के खेल A में भाग लेने वाले खिलाड़ियों की संख्या जोड़ी गई: 31 + 24 + 18 + 29 + 12 + 40 = 154। खेल B में भाग लेने वाले खिलाड़ियों की कुल संख्या: 58 + 36 + 26 + 37 + 33 + 44 = 234। अनुपात 154:234 है, जिसे सरल करने पर 77:117 प्राप्त होता है। इसलिए सही अनुपात 77:117 है।
key_concepts: पाई चार्ट या तालिका से जानकारी निकालना
अनुपात को सरल रूप में परिवर्तित करना

questions.original_question: (mx + n) is a factor of:

english.explanation: (mx + n) is a factor of option 2 because it is a perfect square trinomial. The expression m²x² + 2mnx + n² factors into (mx + n)², making (mx + n) a factor. The other options do not satisfy this condition under general values of m and n.

questions.original_question: &Delta;ABC is a right - angle triangle at B. If tan A = <span class="math-tex">\({{5} \over 12}\)</span>, then sin A + sin B + sin C will be equal to:

<p>Study the given triangle and find the length of BC.</p>

<p><img alt="" src="//storage.googleapis.com/tb-img/production/23/02/F1_SSC_Ishita_24.02.23_D3.png" style=" width: 215px; height: 194px;" /></p>
With an average speed of 45 km/h, a train reaches its destination on time. If it goes with an average speed of 30 km/h, it is late by 15 minutes. The total journey is:

The tax on the salary of C is&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{1} \over 4}\)</span>&nbsp;of the salary and savings are&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{1} \over 3}\)</span>&nbsp;of the salary. The ratio of the expenditures to the savings is ______.
In a 1200 m race, bike A beats bike B by 100 m. Bike B beats bike C by 100 m in a 600 m race. If bike A beats bike C by 30 sec in a 720 m race, then what is the speed of bike C?
A dishonest trader says to customers that he sells his goods at a cost price, but he uses a false weight and gains 12.5% as profit. How many grams does he use to weigh 1 kg?
Find the largest number of 3 digits divisible by 4 and 7.
A and B working separately can complete a piece of work in 10 and 16 days, respectively. If they work for a day alternately, with A beginning the work, in how many day(s) will the work be completed?
If the length of the diagonal of a cube is 7<span class="math-tex">\({\sqrt{3} }\)</span> cm, then the surface area of the cube is ______.
If &Delta;BPQ &cong; &Delta;ASR and &ang;A =&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{1} \over 3}\)</span>&ang;R = &ang;S then find &ang;Q. (All angles are in degrees).
Two identical circles each of radius 30 cm intersect each other such that the circumference of each one passes through the centre of the other. What is the area of the intersecting region?
The marked price of a chair is ₹2,400, which is 20% above the cost price. If the chair is sold at a discount of 10% on marked price, what is the profit percentage?
A sum becomes Rs. 15,500 in 7 years on simple interest at the rate of 30 percent per annum. What is the total interest for the 7 years?

If x + y + z = 0, then what is the value of&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{x^2} \over (yz)}\)</span>&nbsp;+&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{y^2} \over (xz)}\)</span>&nbsp;+&nbsp;<span class="math-tex">\({{z^2} \over (xy)}\)</span>?
What is the possible value of (a + b + c) &ndash; 3 , if a<sup>2</sup> + b<sup>2</sup> + c<sup>2</sup> = 9 and ab + bc + ca = 8?
If the 8-digit number 123456xy is divisible by 8, then the total possible pairs of (x, y) are:
The area of a sector of a circle is 308 cm<sup>2</sup>, with the central angle measuring 45&deg;. The radius of the circle is:
The cost of apples is increased by 20% and then decreased by 20%. What is the net pecentage decrease?

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>The anchor gave us a ______&nbsp;welcome, a pleasant smile and a bouquet on reaching the hotel.</p>

<p><strong>Select the correct passive voice form for the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Rashi was writing a letter to her husband.</p>

options.value: A letter was being written by Rashi to her husband.
A letter were being written by Rashi to her husband.
A letter was been written by Rashi to her husband.
A letter were been written by Rashi to her husband.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>The study of languages</p>

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Exemplary</p>
<strong>Choose the incorrectly spelt word.</strong>

<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>Sharp and direct</p>

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate synonym of the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Keen</p>
<strong>Select the INCORRECTLY spelt word.</strong>

<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the underlined group of words.</strong></p>

<p>After my father passed away, I used to look at a <u>series of stars</u>, trying to find the unknown.</p>

<p><strong>Select the option that can be used as a one-word substitute for the given group of words.</strong></p>

<p>One who does something not professionally but for pleasure</p>

<p><strong>Select the most appropriate ANTONYM of the word &lsquo;polite&rsquo; in the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>The rude and insensitive murderer pleaded for mercy in the court.</p>

<p><strong>The following sentence has been split into four segments. Identify the segment that contains an error.</strong></p>

<p>The newspaper reported / that it was a mystery / how the thieves enter / the house.</p>

<p><strong>Select the word that is OPPOSITE in meaning to the given word.</strong></p>

<p>Adversity</p>

<p><strong>Select the option that expresses the given sentence in active voice.</strong></p>

<p>Let the farewell be bidden to our seniors.</p>

options.value: We should be bidden farewell by our seniors.
Our seniors should bid farewell to us.
Let us bid farewell to our seniors.
Our seniors should be bidden farewell.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate collocating word to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>I listened to him with ______&nbsp;attention.</p>

<p><strong>Parts of the following sentence have been given as options. Select the option that contains a grammatical error. If you don&rsquo;t find any error, mark &lsquo;No error&rsquo; as your answer.</strong></p>

<p>Amla juice / is rich with / Vitamin C. / no error</p>

<p><strong>Select the correct indirect form of the given sentence.</strong></p>

<p>Kavya said to her husband, &ldquo;I don&rsquo;t mind being a busy woman.&rdquo;</p>

options.value: Kavya told her husband that she had not mind being a busy woman.
Kavya told her husband that she do not mind being a busy woman.
Kavya said to her husband she did not mind being a busy woman.
Kavya told her husband that she did not mind being a busy woman.

questions.original_question:
<p><strong>Select the most appropriate option to fill in the blank.</strong></p>

<p>They hired her to increase sales, but her strategies failed to ______.</p>
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 1.
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 2.
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 3.
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 4.
Select the most appropriate option to fill in blank number 5.
